text: Friendly staff and positive environment. The kids that work there exude positivity and everyone is always nice over the phone. You can tell that the employees actually care about making good pizzas! My order is always correct and on time. …More

name: Tim Kruger
text: I called, someone picked up and said hello, i started to order then the person asked if i could hold just a moment then was placed on hold for 10 minutes before i hung up. Called back after 40 minutes and was informed that an employee stabbed another employee. Whelp. I cant even begin to imagine how to respond to this.

text: Great food but always a mess up with our salad and drinks. Order two two liters or two 20oz only comes with one even tho two are on receipt.  Always order salad with no black olives and guess what always comes on it .. you guessed it black …More

name: Greg Palmer
text: I asked for a medium special pizza with everything and 3 Cheesier bread. I was told $35.00 for both. The price seems a little high, don’t you have a special pizza. The girl just keep piling  on the toppings, apparently she couldn’t tell me …More

name: Olivia Wright
text: Always have a great experience here. The food is wonderful, and my deliveries are always timely. The manager, whose name is Rachel, has always been incredibly kind to all customers, always offering anything to make up for minor mistakes. …More

text: Love their pizza!  Checked web site for their hours and it states they are open until 11:00 but I guess after Labor Day their hours change.  They were only open until 10:00!  That should be changed when their hours do!!

text: I've  used too buy pizza here. Quality and staff are total lost. They need better management and cooking skills. Food was gross. Pizza dough is over cook. Or under cook. I use to injoy their pizza and bread. Couple years ago. It was great. Ho. They don't give military discount. But. Jets got my back. Go jets.

text: Always have a great experience with the ortonville hungry howies! Always ready when i get there and they are the only place around willing to deliver to my home!

text: Ordered yesterday, my pizza was bare in the middle it literally had no toppings on it. The bread sticks were as hard as a rock, even my dog wouldn't eat it. Really this makes a hot and ready look 100% better. What a waste of money.
